name: Blackness (Robert Dolega)
description:
Oh noo!
Womd is lost in Blackness. Sad and alone, surrounded by dangerous creatures. He have no idea where to go and what to do. Only you can find a way to get him out of Blackness. Help him! Quickly!

How to play:

  • Use WASD or Arrows to move.
  • Press [W] or [Up Arrow] to jump. Press it twice to jump higher.
  • Press [Enter] to use bomb.
  • Press [Spacebar] to use your primary weapon.
  • Press [P] to turn on shield.

During the game you can find some items like Power or Shockwave. You need to find it, to be able, to beat enemies before they defeat you. You also need to find the key, to open the gate to next level.
At the beggining you'll get 10 lives. There is nothing easier to do in Blackness than losing lifes. Be careful and try to collect as many stars as you can. One hundred stars and you got new life. Remember! Red things kills!

Have fun! Good luck! Run!

For 64-bit version of Windows only.

Please let me know if you find some bug or if something doesn't work correctly.
